Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Southbound Reroute near 103rd/Halsted
ShortDescription: SB 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 103rd, Green, 104th and Halsted due to, street blockage near 103rd/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted viaHalsted, 103rd, Green, 104th and Halsted due to, street blockage near 103rd/Halsted.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
